alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 3:42PM EDT until August 20 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... North central Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 342 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greensboro, or 14 miles southwest of Quincy, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quincy, Greensboro, Rock Bluff, Juniper, Sycamore, Lowry, Sawdust and Roy. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
